item.title: Business Rule Management System (BRMS)
item.description: Business Rule Management System (BRMS) is an integrated application development and execution platform that allows organizations to define, deploy and monitor and maintain the vast variety of Automated decisions used by operational systems. A BRMS allows decision logic to be extracted and managed separately from core application code, so that it can be easily understood, maintained and reused access the organization.
